caption.center: DOUGLAS P. KRSTICH, Appellant, v. VALORIE BERTIE and JAMES F. BERTIE,

court.center: District Court of Appeal of Florida, First District.

opinion.posture: An appeal from the Circuit Court for Alachua County. Mark Moseley, Judge.
opinion.attorneys:
Douglas Krstich, pro se, Appellant.
Bill McCollum, Attorney General, Office of the Attorney General, Tallahassee; Gilbert J. Alba and J. Michael Sawyer of the Law Offices of Decarlis Sawyer, Gainesville for Appellees; Valorie Bertie and James F. Bertie, pro se, Appellees.
opinion.opinion_text:
AFFIRMED.
BARFIELD, VAN NORTWICK, and PADOVANO, JJ., CONCUR.
NOT FINAL UNTIL TIME EXPIRES TO FILE MOTION FOR REHEARING AND DISPOSITION THEREOF IF FILED.
